name: PolyHurry!
description: IMPORTANT: If playing in browser, DO NOT hit the quit button ever. Fullscreen recommended. PolyHurry is a physics based fast 2D platformer where the bugs are the features. The alpha is 25 levels long, with the full "release" hopefully having around 40 levels, an in-game speedrun timer and a video cutscene.  The fabled coolest guy trophy awaits you. Either play it in your browser, or cop yourself a download. This is my first real game, so any feedback or bug reporting would be greatly appreciated. Thanks for playing!
